message.content:
cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.SD, cs.DL, cs.DB. 

The paper discusses social tagging and its challenges in improving search efficiency. This topic falls under information retrieval (cs.IR) and social networks (cs.SI) sub-categories. The paper also proposes a novel metric for measuring similarity in large-scale folksonomies, which involves data mining (cs.DL) and database (cs.DB) techniques. Finally, the paper evaluates the proposed metric on three datasets, which falls under the sub-category of systems and software (cs.SD).
